actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: To amend title 37, United States Code, to authorize travel and transportation allowances for family members to attend the funeral and memorial services of members of the uniformed services.

summary.text: This bill authorizes travel and transportation allowances for family members to attend funeral and memorial services of members of the uniformed services.

titles.title: To amend title 37, United States Code, to authorize travel and transportation allowances for family members to attend the funeral and memorial services of members of the uniformed services.
